name: Fake Blaseball or Siesta No More
name_original: Fake Blaseball or Siesta No More
description:
This was made as a quick goof for a friend and is in no way affiliated with Blaseball or The Game Band.

Siestas got you down? Just want to have your own Blaseball league?

You're the commissioner now dawg and you're doing a GREAT job!

Arrows move the cursor, Z/O select.

There is a beg option in the enter/start menu.
